content: As discussed on our last earnings call, we announced several exciting partnerships in Q1, including; one, a joint venture with 2021.AI to collaborate exclusively on the integration of their artificial intelligence platform with the new V2G platform; two, a partnership with Swell to offer a combined solar, stationary battery storage and intelligent EV charging for residential and commercial market; three, Levo's first commercial win, a 10-year contract with the Troy School District that marks the largest and first 100% plan zero emission school bus fleet conversion in the Midwest.
